text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/219c7d063823498be22aae46dd024d77b5fb2a58|patch 8.2.0191: cannot put a terminal in a popup window>
patch 8.2.0191: cannot put a terminal in a popup window

Problem:    Cannot put a terminal in a popup window.
Solution:   Allow opening a terminal in a popup window.  It will always have
            keyboard focus until closed.

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.0191: cannot put a terminal in a popup window · vim/vim@219c7d0
attachments.title: patch 8.2.0191: cannot put a terminal in a popup window · vim/vim@219c7d0
attachments.text: Problem: Cannot put a terminal in a popup window. Solution: Allow opening a terminal in a popup window. It will always have keyboard focus until closed.

text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/3180fe6c6dc0728d21c6318b957022b029c234f0|patch 8.2.0195: some tests fail when run in the GUI>
patch 8.2.0195: some tests fail when run in the GUI

Problem:    Some tests fail when run in the GUI.
Solution:   Make sure the window width is enough.  In the GUI run terminal Vim
            in the terminal, if possible.

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.0195: some tests fail when run in the GUI · vim/vim@3180fe6
attachments.title: patch 8.2.0195: some tests fail when run in the GUI · vim/vim@3180fe6
attachments.text: Problem: Some tests fail when run in the GUI. Solution: Make sure the window width is enough. In the GUI run terminal Vim in the terminal, if possible.

patch 8.2.0196: blocking commands for a finished job in a popup window

Problem:    Blocking commands for a finished job in a popup window.
Solution:   Do not block commands if the job has finished.  Adjust test.

attachments.text: Problem: Blocking commands for a finished job in a popup window. Solution: Do not block commands if the job has finished. Adjust test.
